tasks.label: Update version references
args: $ErrorActionPreference = 'Stop'; $v = '1.9.90'; (Get-Content README.md) -replace 'v1\.9\.89','v1.9.90' | Set-Content README.md; (Get-Content docs/index.html) -replace 'v1\.9\.89','v1.9.90' | Set-Content docs/index.html; (Get-Content Supervertaler.py) -replace '__version__\s*=\s*\"[0-9\.]+\"','__version__ = \"'+$v+'\"' | Set-Content Supervertaler.py
